import React from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import { useCounter } from '../../hooks/useCounter' import SectionTitle from '../../components/layout/SectionTitle' import { useFetch } from '../../hooks/useFetch' const UseRef = (props) => { const [count, inc, dec] = useCounter(10) const url = 'http://files.cod3r.com.br/curso-react/estados.json' const response = useFetch(url) //http://files.cod3r.com.br/curso-react/estados.json return (
{count}
) } export default UseRef
